quoteText:
We may update our privacy policy from time to time.
If we make material changes to how we treat our usersâ€™ Personal Information, we will post the new privacy policy on this page with a notice that the privacy policy has been updated and notify you by email specified in your account and an in-app alert the first time you use the Service after we make the change.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
